## IConversationStore.updateMember() method

Update a member of a conversation

This can be used for example to promote a member to an owner, or to demote an owner to a regular member.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateMember(conversationId: ConversationId, userId: UserId, update: Partial<IMemberUpdate>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  conversationId | <code>ConversationId</code> | The conversation where a member should be updated |
|  userId | <code>UserId</code> | The member to update |
|  update | <code>Partial&lt;IMemberUpdate&gt;</code> | Settings to update for the member. Any setting that is not included will keep the existing value. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

## Exceptions

ConversationNotFound [ConversationNotFound](./core-conversations.conversationnotfound.md)

UserNotEntitled [UserNotEntitled](./core-conversations.usernotentitled.md)

ConversationInactive [ConversationInactive](./core-conversations.conversationinactive.md)

NotARoom [NotARoom](./core-conversations.notaroom.md)

NoOwnerInConversation [NoOwnerInConversation](./core-conversations.noownerinconversation.md)
